name: Keyboard Hero (TimeTickswithcats)
description:
Ever wanted to play a guitar hero game but you just don't have a guitar hero guitar?

Well, I don't know if someone will play this game correctly, but it's a game that works!

Supposed to be a test with save files for easy charting, as well as making a rhythm game :D

(you can change the charting, simply save it under Level#, then go to your account name (Windows), Appdata, LocalLow. Find the company, and get the saved file. Then import it into Data, levels.)
